pastePrivateKey: Paste your private key here if you want to restore your wallet.
privateKeySecurity: Your password allows you to enter your account. Every account has a unique password. We recommend that you copy and back up the password in TWO locations that will remain secure even if you lose your phone, like a Facebook message sent to yourself and an email sent to yourself. Do not let anyone else see or have access to your password, because doing so will give this person complete access to the money that you store in your Billetera account.
